description: Join the legendary Penguin Parade and witness these tuxedo-clad creatures showcase their moonwalk skills.
Embark on a search for the mythical blue donut. This tour includes one brief, but intense, search through enchanted bakeries.
Dive into the mysterious world of sock puppets, and learn the ancient art of sock puppet diplomacy.
Hop aboard the Airship of Dreams for a 30-minute flight over clouds made entirely of marshmallows.
Take part in a time-travel experiment where you'll attempt to teach a caveman how to ride a unicycle.
Join us for an expedition to find the lost city of Popcornopolis, where the streets are paved with buttery snacks.
Take a 25-minute tour through the secretive world of invisible art, where you’ll see absolutely nothing… but it’s definitely art.
Embark on a magical journey to witness the annual Jellybean Rebellion, where jellybeans fight for their right to be delicious.
Join us for a speed tour through the Underground Library of Whispering Books, where every page has a secret to tell.
Explore the wonders of the Galactic Doughnut Factory, where we make cosmic pastries for intergalactic travelers.
Unveil the mysteries of the Bubblegum Forest, where the trees are made of sugar and every leaf is a burst of sweetness.
Take a ride on the Pancake Carousel, where each pancake spins you into a new layer of syrupy wonder.
Join us for the annual Frog Olympics, where amphibians compete in high-jump and synchronized swimming events.
Explore the mysterious Land of Endless Pizza, where every corner offers a new topping to discover.
Join a group of eccentric magicians as they attempt to make the moon disappear with only a rubber chicken and a hat.
Take a secretive tour through the world of jellybean flavor alchemy, where we concoct wild and wacky new flavors every day.
Visit the Upside-Down Circus, where all the performers perform their acts while standing on their hands.
Embark on a quest to find the rarest species of glow-in-the-dark potato, an adventure that will take you deep into the heart of the Great Underground Tubers.
Witness the great acrobatics of flying spaghetti, and marvel at its gravitational pull as it defies the laws of pasta physics.
Join a tribe of dancing potatoes for a rhythmic celebration that will leave you with mashed memories of the experience.
Climb aboard a cloud in search of the elusive Cloud Yeti, an ethereal creature that only appears during lightning storms.
Discover the art of extreme ironing as you go on an adventure to press shirts in the most unlikely of places.
Navigate the treacherous mountain ranges of marshmallow peaks, where the journey will be sweet but perilous.
Enter the mysterious world of teleporting llamas, who will guide you through time and space to witness their ancient rituals.
A surreal ride through the world of giant inflatable animals that only come to life when they’re not being watched.
